repairedDockerfile:
FROM camptocamp/c2cwsgiutils:2 
MAINTAINER St√©phane Brunner <stephane.brunner@camptocamp.com> 

RUN \
 apt-get update && \
 apt-get install -y --assume-yes --no-install-recommends \
ca-certificates \
libmapnik-dev \
mapnik-utils \
gdal-bin \
libdb-dev \
fonts-dejavu \
node-carto \
osm2pgsql \
curl \
unzip && \
cd /tmp && \
mkdir /fonts && \
mkdir /project && \
apt-get clean && \
rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /root/.cache/*

COPY requirements.txt /app/ 

RUN \  
cd /app && \  
pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt 

ENV TILEGENERATION_CONFIGFILE=/etc/tilegeneration/config.yaml \  
C2CWSGI_LOG_LEVEL=WARN \  
TILECLOUD_LOG_LEVEL=INFO \  
TILECLOUD_CHAIN_LOG_LEVEL=INFO \  
GUNICORN_PARAMS="-b :80 --worker-class gthread --threads 15 --workers 3" \  
VISIBLE_ENTRY_POINT=/ 

EXPOSE 80 

WORKDIR /project 

COPY . /app/ 

RUN \
 cd /app && \
 pip install --no-cache-dir --editable=. && \
mv docker/run /usr/bin/
